intro: Zaluzianskya bella, commonly known as the fairy lantern, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It is a member of the Aizoaceae family, known for its unique and colorful flowers. The plant produces striking, lantern-shaped blooms in shades of red, orange, and yellow. It thrives in well-drained soil and full sun, making it a popular choice for rock gardens. Zaluzianskya bella is also valued for its drought tolerance and ability to attract pollinators.
